summary.span: 表示两个 对象之间的父/子关系。

span.span: Represents a parent/child relationship between two objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用于 通过对象将两个对象相互关联 。A is used to relate two objects to each other through objects. 例如，在客户/订单关系中，Customers 表是父表，Orders 表是关系的子表。For example, in a Customer/Orders relationship, the Customers table is the parent and the Orders table is the child of the relationship. 这类似于主键/外键关系。This is similar to a primary key/foreign key relationship. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [导航 datarelation](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/navigating-datarelations)。For more information, see [Navigating DataRelations](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/navigating-datarelations). 关系是在父表和子表中的匹配列之间创建的。Relationships are created between matching columns in the parent and child tables. 也就是说， 这两个列的值必须相同。That is, the value for both columns must be identical. 关系还可以将来自父行的不同更改级联 到其子行。Relationships can also cascade various changes from the parent to its child rows. 若要控制如何在子行中更改值，请将添加 到 对象的 。To control how values are changed in child rows, add a to the of the object. 确定在删除或更新父表中的值时要执行的操作。The determines what action to take when a value in a parent table is deleted or updated. 创建时 ，它首先验证是否可以建立关系。When a is created, it first verifies that the relationship can be established. 在将其添加到后 ，通过禁用会使其失效的任何更改来维护关系。After it is added to the , the relationship is maintained by disallowing any changes that would invalidate it. 在 创建并将添加到的时间段之间，可以对 父行或子行进行其他更改。Between the period when a is created and added to the , it is possible for additional changes to be made to the parent or child rows. 如果这会导致关系不再有效，则会生成异常。An exception is generated if this causes a relationship that is no longer valid. > [!NOTE] > 如果两个表之间定义了双向关系，则可能发生数据损坏。Data corruption can occur if a bi-directional relation is defined between two tables. 双向关系包括两个 `DataRelation` 对象，这些对象使用相同的列，并切换了父子角色。A bi-directional relation consists of two `DataRelation` objects that use the same columns, with the parent-child roles switched. 保存对象时不会引发异常 `DataRelation` ; 但是，可能会发生数据损坏。No exception is raised when the `DataRelation` objects are saved; however, data corruption can occur. 对象包含在中 ，你可以通过 的属性 和的 和 属性 访问这些对象。 objects are contained in a , which you can access through the property of the , and the and properties of the . ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个新的 ，并将其添加到的 。The following example creates a new and adds it to the of a . [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataRelation Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataRelation Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataRelation Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataRelation Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: This type is safe for multithreaded read operations.

threadsafe.span: 必须同步任何写入操作。

span.span: You must synchronize any write operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用 对象来定义分层关系，例如，在 XML 中指定的关系。You can use objects to define hierarchical relationships, such as those specified in XML. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [嵌套 datarelation](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/nesting-datarelations)。For more information, see [Nesting DataRelations](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/nesting-datarelations). > [!NOTE] > 如果 关系中子表的与关系的父表中的列的匹配 ，则该 属性必须为 false。If the of the child table in the relation matches the of a column in the parent table in the relation, the property must be false. .NET Framework 版本1.0 不需要此操作。This was not required with the .NET Framework version 1.0.
